item.title: The Enigma of Ruby Boolean (or the lack thereof)
item.description: Imagine this: You wake up half-asleep to discover Darth Vader in a rage.

item.title: Monkey Patching in Ruby
item.description: Ruby, as you all know, is a dynamic programming language that provides the ability and hence freedom to reopen the existing classes and change their behavior during runtime by adding new methods or modifying existing methods.
